text: Granthadavarē, (idīga) nim'ma baḷige nam'ma dūtaru bandiddāre. Granthadallina, nīvu aḍagisiṭṭidda halavu viṣayagaḷannu avaru nimage spaṣṭa paḍisuttiddāre mattu (nim'ma tappugaḷalli) heccinavugaḷannu avaru kṣamisuttiddāre. Nijakkū nim'ma baḷige allāhana vatiyinda ondu prakāśa mattu bahaḷa spaṣṭavāda ondu granthavu bandide
